TopicTitle: What is your Favorite KSP loading screen?

Articles.Content:
Ksp has great loading screens, but some are better than others. So, I'm asking what my fellow kerbonauts favorite loading screens are. Explain why the loading screen is your favorite.
My favorite is this loading screen. I feel like it captures the adventure of ksp ain a way I can't fully explain. It seems like these 2 kerbals are the first to do something and there is some kind of understanding between them.
